name: Qipit
overview:
Qipit provides mobile document copy solutions for consumers and enterprises.

  • www.qipit.com is a free service that turns photos of documents, whiteboards, etc into clear, easy to read copies. Qipit turns camera phones into handeld copy machines, faxes and document scanners.

  • Qipit also powers mobile document capture solutions for the enterprise. With multiple installed references, Qipit transitioned from being the first company to offer mobile document capture from camera phones, to the leader in mobile enterprise document capture.

Qipit is a sister company of Realeyes3D, a recognized pioneer in mobile imaging.

Qipit has been based in San Francisco since 2006. More information on blog.qipit.com.
